title: Creativity
description: Evaluate originality with LLM-as-a-judge ratings and plagiarism detection tools. Test creative flexibility with prompts requiring metaphor, narrative shifts, or stylistic imitation. Distinguish between creativity and coherence in evaluation.

title: Coherence
description: Test long-range narrative consistency over several paragraphs or sections. Evaluate entity tracking, plot consistency, and ability to handle multiple characters/topics. Measure coherence degradation under long-context scenarios.

title: Instruction Following
description: Assess compliance with explicit constraints (word limit, tone, format). Evaluate multi-step instruction-following ability. Use structured evaluation with LLM-as-a-judge for grading adherence.

title: Factuality
description: Introduce fact-checking tasks where incorrect but plausible facts are intentionally inserted. Evaluate external-knowledge reasoning vs. hallucination susceptibility. Test consistency across multiple rewrites of the same factual prompt.
